parameters.name: PlayerId
parameters.documentation: The player the animal should belong to.

parameters.name: TribeType
parameters.documentation: The type of the tribe this animal belongs to. E.g. `"deers"`

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.documentation: The type of the job. E.g. `"adult_animal"`

parameters.name: ObjectId
parameters.documentation: The object id which allows the animal to be referenced by missions. Normally `0`.

parameters.name: Behaviour
parameters.documentation: Defines special behaviours of the animal. Number interpreted as bitfield.
